org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel

Interface AutoFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HSSFAutoFilter, XSSFAutoFilter 

    public interface AutoFilter
    Represents autofiltering for the specified worksheet.

    Filtering data is a quick and easy way to find and work with a subset of data in a range of cells or table. For example, you can filter to see only the values that you specify, filter to see the top or bottom values, or filter to quickly see duplicate values.

    TODO YK: For now (Aug 2010) POI only supports setting a basic autofilter on a range of cells. In future, when we support more auto-filter functions like custom criteria, sort, etc. we will add corresponding methods to this interface.    (表示指定工作表的自动过滤。过滤数据是一种快速简单的方法，可以在一系列单元格或表格中查找和处理数据子集。例如，您可以过滤以仅查看指定的值、过滤以查看顶部或底部值，或者过滤以快速查看重复值。TODO YN：目前（2010年8月），DOE仅支持在一系列单元格上设置基本自动过滤器。将来，当我们支持更多自定义条件、排序等自动过滤功能时，我们会在这个界面中添加相应的方法。)
